name: Nightmare Swamp
description:
This is a shrek horror game where you need to find 8 onions inside the swamp.

But you have a guest waiting for you in the swamp. He hates when intuders come there. Usually the intruders never come back.

Also he loves onions, layers. Anyone who touches his onions, will be eaten alive. Every time you collect an onion, he will get more aggressive.

Conserve your stamina, you never know when you may need it.

Will you be able to collect all the 8 onions alive?
